name: Gusto
description:
Must have at least two controllers. Play as slimes/cubes in a competitive, local-multiplayer game. Push yourself into the other players to knock your opponents towards their death. Or use a ball to do it for you. That'll work too. 

Credits: 

  • Jacob Youakim
  • Alex Hallee
